attacks.name: Aqua Ring
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Shot
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Water Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tapu Storm-GX
attacks.effect: Shuffle your opponent's Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it into their deck. If your opponent has no Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
